channel.title: OpenStack on Welcome to dave.dev
channel.description: Recent content in OpenStack on Welcome to dave.dev

item.title: OpenStack Summit Barcelona 2016: Current State
item.description: It’s October in the UK and blimey charlie, it’s a bit chilly.

item.title: OpenStack Summit, Tokyo 2015, Thursday 29th – Show Notes
item.description: It’s Thursday, it’s 9am and…straight in to sessions. No keynote today, which is no bad thing considering these days are long!

item.title: OpenStack Summit, Tokyo 2015, Wednesday 28th – Show Notes
item.description: It’s Tuesday, it’s 9am and most people have hangovers from the numerous evening events going on in and around Takanawa.

item.title: OpenStack Summit, Tokyo 2015, Tuesday 27th – Show Notes
item.description: It’s Tuesday morning, it’s 9am and the keynote started off in a blaze of glory.
